events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and the recruitment process has commenced.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your software development skills.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the next steps of the software engineer recruitment process.
The initial screening of your software development background and experience has been completed successfully.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed response to the screening questions; this helps us move forward with your application.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior software engineering team for next Tuesday at 10 AM UTC.
